instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..
definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>)
threads.message: Macbook was have small liquid damage near <CHIP>U6200</CHIP> and <CHIP>U6201</CHIP> but it was really small and I cleaned with 99% alcohol,no visible damage all clean and silver (like baby butt),The issue is that trackpad and keyboard not working ,power button works only ,and wont turn on if there is no battery ,once turn on you can remove battery still working ok so only to start up need battery installed ,battery charging ok

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>)
threads.message: Does and external keyboard and mouse work? Tried known good trackpad and trackpad flex?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>)
threads.message: Trackpad fles cable is very common problem or trackpad itself. Trackpad needs to be connected for keyboard to work.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>)
threads.message: SOLVED It was flex cable for trackpad
